subject: Concussions
College Athletics
Football
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: The university settled out of court with the former football player Preston Plevretes, who sustained a concussion in 2005 that he said has led to more serious health problems.
snippet: The university settled out of court with the former football player Preston Plevretes, who sustained a concussion in 2005 that he said has led to more serious health problems.
